trans:
Therefore, I notify you of the necessity and urgency of paying the salary equivalent to five months, and if not, I will be forced to file a labor complaint and take legal action against you regarding this matter, considering your responsibility for the value of this leave and adding it to my dues in case the employment contract with you is terminated. Please note that this message should not be interpreted as a resignation letter; it is a demand for the dues that have not been paid. Any further action taken by you as a penalty for sending this message will be considered an unfair dismissal and will require compensation according to the law.
I would like to inform you that I have previously made multiple amicable attempts to request this matter from the administration, but there has been no response from the clinic management, which led me to begin making this request officially.
Therefore, I notify you of the need to pay the leave allowance for the period mentioned above to prevent legal actions being taken against you.
You are fully responsible for this matter.
For your information,
and I thank you for your understanding, I would like to acknowledge that I am still working and continuing my duties for you until the expiration of the renewed employment contract, as per its terms.
Notified by: Raafat Yassin Abdel Rahman, Legal Consultant
Note: The same request was previously sent to the Administrative Affairs Manager through several messages via WhatsApp, Mr. Darwish.
